content:
The verification team identified, through the verification process, ten CARs and one CL. No FAR is raised in this verification. The client has taken actions and submitted to EPIC the revised monitoring report and supporting evidence. The verification team, through the verification process, confirmed that the emission reductions achieved by the project activity during the monitoring period are correctly calculated in the monitoring report, Version 2, dated 04-November-2015. Therefore, EPIC certifies the emission reductions amounting to 227,611 tCOze for the period 31-March-2013 to 31-March-2015 (both days inclusive).
